content: **snuggle bunny** 1 is a soft and hugable friend that every child will love it is crocheted in snuggle solid which is a chunky and super soft microfibre yarn with a a stimulating surface this makes it the perfect choice for baby- and children s things - and therefor also perfect for such a cute friend as this enjoy **materials ** size 6 mm crochet hook hobbii snuggle solid - color no 05 & 03 safety eyes 16 mm filling **measurements ** approx 36 cm **yarn needed ** approx 130g main color 1 meter color 03 for nose **abbreviations ** magic_ring magic_ring st stitch single_crochet single_crochet decrease together 1 https //hobbii com/snuggle-bunny utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=snuggle-bunny+hbtrack&utm_term=swr
